TopicTitle: Land speed record on the cheap

Articles.Content:
Travel as quickly as possible on land for under 500 cost expended in fuel or lost parts. The vehicle itself may be any cost but anything you can't recover is considered an expense. No glitch-powered propulsion, no ISRU.

 

Feel free to cheat your way over to an icecap.

Edited February 7, 2021 by Pds314
